column3: hey you guys
hey
so what do you think

eyes no no your eyes no chandlers eyes

didnt you used to have a pair they were really round burgundy and they made you look kind of
feminine
yes
no
i think the glasses look great they make you look sexy
really
yeah
you didnt think i used to wear glasses right
of course
what do you want for an engagement present
oh thats okay were not having a party so you dont have to get us
if someone wants to give us a present we dont want to deprive them of that joy
oh you should get them one of those little cd players
oh i already have one
unless someone borrowed it and left it at the gynecologist
yeah and by someone she means joey
hey i know what i want
what we want honey
no you dont want this i want to have your grandmothers cookie recipe
you mean the chocolate chip cookie recipe
uhhuh yeah
the one my grandmother made me swear on her deathbed that i would never let out of our family
dying people say the craziest things
i wanted it for years i was gonna make cookies for my children
break my all right
ill be the mom makes the worlds best chocolate chip cookies
our kids are gonna be fat arent they
ahoy
hey hows the boat
im finally
you finally took it out of the marina
why would i do that it took three guys to get the thing in there
if you dont sail it what do you do on it
its great its a great place to just sit hang around drink a few beers eat some chips
its good that you finally have a place to do that
joey i could teach you to sail if you want
you could
yeah ive been sailing my whole life when i was fifteen my dad bought me my own boat
your own boat
he was trying to cheer me up my pony was sick
you know what i was thinkin
what
nothing i just like to go like this
chandler what are you doing tonight
why do you have a lecture
no why
then free as a bird whats up
my dad to know if you to play racquetball
wow thats great dad must like you he doesnt ask just anyone to play
he didnt really ask for you he asked for chauncey i assumed he meant you
did you correct him
no i thought it would be more fun this way
maybe this is something you do every week
or you could sit on the porch and make sure no one steals the trash cans he does that every week too
just so you know you have to let him hates to lose
oh no problem maybe ill play with my left hand
youre not a lefty
does anybody know me
whats wrong phoebe
i just went to my old apartment to get the cookie recipe and that stupid fire burned it up
no why didnt you make a copy and keep it in a fireproof box and keep it at least a hundred yards away from the original
because im normal that was the one legacy my grandmother left me and i know you wanted it as an engagement present
we have to get you an engagement present
dont worry about it pheebs

okay here i dont have the recipe but here i wish you health and happiness
an old cookie

we cant accept this
why not
because its gross
no wait i think i can figure out the recipe from this cookie i do this at work all the time

i think i can

two ive been engaged twice

joey just ignore the boats were not finished with the lesson yet
all right
im gonna go over the basic points one more time
come on rach not again i got it okay lets start sailing i want to go over there where that boatload of girls is yeah oh
oh is that what you wanna do you want to give a shout out to the old hot chicas okay lets do that sailor joe quick question though whats this called
uh boat rope
wrong how do you get the mainsail up
uh rub it

id say come again know this one uh
times up now youre dead
and deaf

yes
this isnt a game you get hurt out here so do you want to pay attention or do you want to die
i want to make a ship to shore call to chandler
all right i definitely taste nutmeg

that and arrogance
hey
hey how was sailing
i dont want to talk about it you couldve saved me a whole cookie
women are mean
i cant believe that now the only thing left of my grandmothers legacy is this crumb i wish you a long and happy marriage
hey
how was it
well i had a great time um chauncey on the other hand
i will tell the story it was going great i let him win we were bonding he even said i could call him dad
and what did he ask you not to call him
daddy look heres the story we had just finished playing racquetball and we were gonna take a steam i walk into the steam room and it really i take off my glasses and thats when it happened guys
over here
have a seat son hey
oh my god chandler i cant believe it
i know
you gave my father a lap dance
why do they put so much steam in there
cause otherwise theyd have to call it the room
why okay why why did that have to happen
come on its not that big a deal
not that big a deal there was touching of things
i know you wanted to bond with my dad but did you have to bond to that part
listen im sure dad doesnt care he probably thought this was funny hell be telling this story for years
i dont want him to tell this story for years
oh but he will he still tells the story how monica tried to escape from fat camp
i wasnt escaping
then how you get caught in the barbed wire
i was trying to help out a squirrel
you were trying to eat it
if that is your father calling to tell this story then the marriage is off
come on hello im sorry you have the wrong number okay ill call you later dad i love you
all right im off to see your dad
you a little over dressed
yeah and you better make sure he tips you this time
i figured i would try to convince him not to tell the story anymore and i figure the best way to do that was face to by face i dont mean his lap and by face i dont mean my ass

i dont know they didnt get us anything
thank you
hey
well hello so when are we gettin back out on the water matey
oh uh i dont know the boat way to say this but never
why not
because youre mean on the boat
what i was just trying to teach you
well lesson learned rachel is mean
i remember when she took me out on her dads boat she wouldnt let me help at all
excuse me i wanted you to help but you couldnt move your arms because you were wearing three life jackets
you have to respect the sea

look joey im sorry if you thought that was mean but i gotta tell something that was not mean my father is mean he used to yell at me all the time on the boat it was horrible i was being a good teacher
does a good teacher say put down the beer pinhead
does a good student drink seven beers during his first lesson
six and a half you knocked that last one out of my hand remember
i didnt want you to get hit by the boom
well it hit me anyway and it hurt a lot less if i had finished that last beer
im sorry i will try to tone it down and uh stop yelling
you wont boss me around
no
and youll be nice
and be
and youll be topless
and
do you want me to learn

oh these are pretty good
yeah but not as good as batch seventeen

the ones we had after you almost threw up

are there any more from the good batch  we could  work off  those

right

oh when we did that was when that bird was overhead with the fish in his mouth did you see it it was gross

no i did not see the bird i did not see the fish i did not see the piece of styrofoam shaped like mike tyson i did not because i was trying to teach you how to sail a boat which obviously is an impossible thing to do
thats it youre yelling and i dont see you taking your top off i quit
what do you mean you cant quit
why not
because youre not finished i wont have it greens do not quit
greens im a tribbiani and tribbianis quit
oh my god wait did i just said greens dont quit didnt i did i just say greens dont quit
yes and youre still yelling at me

no im not yelling at you im just yelling near you oh god joey oh im my father oh my god this is horrible ive been trying so hard not to be my mother i did not see this comin oh joey im sorry im so sorry i just wanted you to learn
well hey i did learn
really
yeah come on
no
yeah its okay i know what a mainsail i know i know to duck when the boom comes across i know port is right
left

looking up

toulouse

i understand completely theres nothing more horrifying than embarrassing yourself in front of your inlaws as a matter of fact when i started dating judy i was unemployed her father asked me what i did for a living i told him i was a lawyer

they never did so if you ever see me giving them legal advice just nod along shall we
so i guess we wear swimsuits in here
